issue.title: C++: Add missing virtual destructors
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1179](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1179). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Fixes some of the problems with Fedora 24 and the `manylinux1` wheels. Segfaults sadly still persist.
